items.sentence: Tom is in the brig for disobeying a direct order from his commanding officer.

You didn't know that you were supposed to do that before I got here, did you?
Which of the languages that you know was the most difficult for you to learn?
Man needs two years to learn to talk and sixty years to learn how to shut up.
Tom arrived at the airport several hours before his flight was due to depart.

There are many rest stops along the freeway for the convenience of travelers.
